tracks.text: McCool throws his boss through a ground floor window.
At the office
At the house
Fugget About It Cares
The Annual Regina Winter Carnival
Cookie and Jimmy smile
Kids line up for the Whack A Seal booth
A child poses at the Wildlife Zoo, in front of a frozen moose, bear, and beaver.
A mother presses her child's tongue against a metal pole. Several other children have their tongues on poles. A sign reads Free Daycare.
Jimmy passes ice sculptures
A man carves spaghetti and meatballs on a pedestal. Jimmy approaches a large, mostly uncut block of ice.
Jimmy stabs at the ice block. He shivers, wraps a scarf around his face, and keeps stabbing.
Large chunks fall away. A crowd begins to gather.
A city skyline takes form
Near the booths, Gina dances amongst the crowd, picking wallets
Another boy does the same
They stare at each other
The boy smiles. Gina smiles back.
Gina pushes him down
Girls walk out in puffy jackets
She removes her jacket
She pours water over herself and gets encased in ice.
At the house
A crowd watches Jimmy
He holds a puck. The crowd produces hockey sticks.
They chase the puck through the snow.
Jimmy puts a stocking over his head and wears sunglasses.
Jinksy chips chunks of ice off a block. He sculpts 3 snowmen beating up a 4th, bleeding snowman
A sculpture of a couple carrying tommy guns. He uses a zester to polish the drum.
He carries the sculpture to a couple labelled "Just Married". He drops the ice on top of a pink cake. The frosting explodes over the couple, who clap.
Jinksy carves 3 men smiling and throwing money in the air. The same 3 men stand nearby, in the same position, smiling.
Cookie frowns in an empty bed at night.
Cheech and Petey ride and escalator
They walk up the frozen escalator.
Jinksy carves a man holding a gun, a man beating another man, legs dangling out of the ground, and a man in a tuxedo.
Theresa stands in ice.
A knife flies past his face
The BareNaked Ladies Gallery present Jinksy
Ice sculptures
McCool waves at Jinksy
Rich Little Casino
Cheech puts down chips. A waitress walks over with drinks.
Petey drinks from a tumbler with a sippy cup lid
Chips pile up around empty sippy tumblers
At the gallery, Jinksy caves a sculpture of Cookie on the roof.
He carves a bed with a heart shaped headboard
Cookie pushes Jinksy into the bed
The bed steams and the headboard sweats into water
A shooting star flies across the moon
She walks away through the foot of standing water
She tenderizes a steak
At the Rich Little Casino
At the Friendly Giant Arena
James Brown dances in the rink in front of 4 women wearing giant feathers
A man plays a guitar
Jinksy rides a wrecking ball down into the rink
A 25 foot ice block rises out of the floor.
At the Rich Little Casino
A bodyguard grabs Cheech's throat
At the Arena, people throw beer cans and bottles at Jinksy
Theresa in ice
